title: 325btc
author: 325btc
content: If you are the small country or even bigger some imfluential person or you might know some of the leaders in there then this one is for you:We will create our new currency we can use it any good blockchain and off course all good contrubuters in this project will get nice air drops.Your part is to force country to use it fully our currency all shops and everything will be use there our currency.Nice rewards for that i prefer countries with natural resources so we can export out from there to sell it and make nice foreign partnership we all gona get nice mansions all over the world.Got interested? So let me know all you have to do is just make our currency as a legal tender and only been used our currency maybe u know someone who know someone but best if this country location has something to export out off course !!Let me know if anyone want to start

comments.author: hyudien
comments.body: Is it that easy to submit a request to adopt a new currency in which we live already related to citizen policy? I know your goals are very good, but a disorganized implementation system, without the full support and no real power, is like inviting people to go to war in Iraq and carry out suicide bombings.Go with the flow, play it safe, while you can still reach without needing to raise a war flag, and have limited power, just so you know we already have Bitcoin and their presence is more than enough.

comments.author: DigitalCurrencyConsultant
comments.body: Big ambitions.What is your history in blockchain technologies?What programs do you know? What is the long term plan? Financial partners in what way? Airdrops you speak of ? What kind of coin? POW? POS? both?What is the plan to fight inflation of the coin?How many coins? So much has to be answered even before anything should be created or planned.Not saying I'm with you but more information must be known, thought thru, shared.

Financial partners in what way? Airdrops you speak of ? What kind of coin? POW? POS? both?What is the plan to fight inflation of the coin?How many coins? So much has to be answered even before anything should be created or planned.Not saying I'm with you but more information must be known, thought thru, shared.I dont know about blockchain ill find someone who do create coin i just connect the coin with country and people im more like business person not the coin creator

Financial partners in what way? Airdrops you speak of ? What kind of coin? POW? POS? both?What is the plan to fight inflation of the coin?How many coins? So much has to be answered even before anything should be created or planned.Not saying I'm with you but more information must be known, thought thru, shared.There might not needee to fight inflation as it will be xrp or xlm or tron kind of coin.Long term plan is to make country people to use it just.Not know the programsHow many coins? Well enough so the previous country treasury of the total fiat currency balance sheet should be to keep it balanced.

comments.author: Bitstar_coin
comments.body: Like the many shitcoins we have in the market are not enough, you want to add yours to the list of shitcoins. You are looking to partner up with influential people and a whole country and you have zero knowledge about blockchain, not even the basics. Why don't you go partner with Do Kwon am sure the both of you would make a good match   No reasonable-sane person will partner with a desperate character like you with zero knowledge and ideas on how the financial system works. Stop looking for ways to print free money it won't happen.

comments.author: X-ray
comments.body: Quote from: 325btc on July 22, 2022, 08:51:50 PMDo kwon might be good It might be good until he will be jailed.  It's clear that if you have zero knowledge about blockchain, man just focus in your real business. If your coins got exploited and who will you blame for that?  These days there are so many people with zero knowledge claimed to be good in business were issuing bunch of scam tokens. Have you told regulators in your country about the come of your coin soon? It seems they need to prepare everything.

comments.author: cabron
comments.body: Quote from: 325btc on July 20, 2022, 11:07:08 PMQuote from: DigitalCurrencyConsultant on July 20, 2022, 06:43:57 PMBig ambitions.What is your history in blockchain technologies?What programs do you know? What is the long term plan? Financial partners in what way? Airdrops you speak of ? What kind of coin? POW? POS? both?What is the plan to fight inflation of the coin?How many coins? So much has to be answered even before anything should be created or planned.Not saying I'm with you but more information must be known, thought thru, shared.There might not needee to fight inflation as it will be xrp or xlm or tron kind of coin.Long term plan is to make country people to use it just.Not know the programsHow many coins? Well enough so the previous country treasury of the total fiat currency balance sheet should be to keep it balanced.There had been experiments with this like the Miamicoin, its not yet proven to work. A country having their own coin will be a lot difficult for other country to trade with. It could be easier for a government to coerce the coins to its people but the country will just be isolating itself from international trades. Using dollar which is the global currency reserve makes trading active to all countries.China and Russia didn't even try  this despite their capability in the world trades but they did create their own currency reserve  rivaling the IMF's SDR.. Source https://markets.businessinsider.com/news/currencies/dollar-dominance-russia-china-rouble-yuan-brics-reserve-currency-imf-2022-6
